This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_MedicationCodeYJ_CS defines many codes, of which the following are a subset:

Code

name: JP_MedicationCodeYJ_CS
title: JP Core Medication YJ CodeSystem
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

contact.name: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

description: 個別医薬品コード(YJコード)のコードシステム
copyright: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)
